subject: Basketball
Domestic Violence
Assaults
lead_paragraph: The basketball star Brittney Griner and her fiancée, Glory Johnson, were arrested on suspicion of assault and disorderly conduct after a fight at their home, authorities said.
snippet: The basketball star Brittney Griner and her fiancée, Glory Johnson, were arrested on suspicion of assault and disorderly conduct after a fight at their home, authorities said.
